thread.title: Jennifer Grey didn't rehearse lift scene in 'Dirty Dancing"
thread.title_full: Jennifer Grey didn't rehearse lift scene in 'Dirty Dancing" - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Jennifer Grey didn't rehearse lift scene in 'Dirty Dancing"
text:
Caters News Agency The lift scene from "Dirty Dancing" was not rehearsed. The most famous scene in the cult classic "Dirty Dancing" got off on the right foot.
Actress Jennifer Grey recently revealed to London's The Guardian the she filmed the iconic lift scene with co-star Patrick Swayze in one day — without practicing it first.
"Never rehearsed it, never done it since," Grey said. “I don't know how all these people who reenact it have the guts to throw themselves into the arms of anyone other than Patrick Swayze. It's insane!"
Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP Jennifer Grey revealed she didn't rehearse the lift scene from "Dirty Dancing." The lift scene has been reenacted several times onscreen, including by Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone in "Crazy, Stupid Love," and by Bradley Cooper and Jennifer Lawrence's in "Silver Linings Playbook."
Even though Grey and her partner Derek Hough won Season 11 of "Dancing with the Stars," the 55-year-old mom-of-one has no desire be thrown up in the air ever again.
Jennifer Grey and Patrick Swayze in the cult classic "Dirty Dancing."
"It happened, enjoy it, watch it over and over again but never ask me to do it again because I'm too f-
